thread.title: Louisville venue to offer $1,000 'micro weddings' on Valentine's Day
thread.title_full: Louisville venue to offer $1,000 'micro weddings' on Valentine's Day

author: Matthew Keck
title: Louisville venue to offer $1,000 'micro weddings' on Valentine's Day
text: Louisville venue to offer $1,000 'micro weddings' on Valentine's Day Advertisement Louisville venue to offer $1,000 'micro weddings' on Valentine's Day Are you planning to tie the knot, but on a budget?Whitehall House, a historic mansion in Louisville, is offering "micro weddings" on Valentine's Day again this year.The cost of each wedding is $1,000 and includes an officiant to perform the ceremony, cake and sparkling cider, and a complimentary wedding portrait. Additional photos from the wedding can be purchased at a separate cost.Micro weddings in 2023: 6 couples have ‘micro weddings’ in Louisville on Valentine’s DayCouples will be allowed to have up to 20 guests attend the wedding, along with choosing to renew their vows.All of the proceeds from the weddings go toward benefitting Whitehall House and Gardens.For more information and to register for a micro wedding, click here. LOUISVILLE, Ky. — Micro weddings in 2023: For more information and to register for a micro wedding, click Are you planning to tie the knot, but on a budget? Whitehall House, a historic mansion in Louisville, is offering "micro weddings" on Valentine's Day again this year. Advertisement The cost of each wedding is $1,000 and includes an officiant to perform the ceremony, cake and sparkling cider, and a complimentary wedding portrait. Additional photos from the wedding can be purchased at a separate cost. Micro weddings in 2023: [6 couples have ‘micro weddings’ in Louisville on Valentine’s Day](https://www.wlky.com/article/couples-micro-weddings-louisville-valentines-day/42893027) Couples will be allowed to have up to 20 guests attend the wedding, along with choosing to renew their vows. All of the proceeds from the weddings go toward benefitting Whitehall House and Gardens. For more information and to register for a micro wedding, click [here.](https://www.historicwhitehall.org/valentines-wedding)
